name: discord_tool
description: Unified Discord tool for complete Discord control: send/read messages (DMs and channels), manage guilds/channels, schedule tasks. Supports advanced time filtering (today, yesterday, specific dates, weekdays), keyword search, batch operations, and smart pagination. Use execute_batch to combine multiple operations in ONE call to save API credits!

message.description: Message content to send (for send_message action). Auto-chunks messages over 2000 characters.

target.description: Target user ID or channel ID (for send_message/read_messages). Auto-detects if target_type not specified.

target_type.description: Type of target: 'user' for DMs or 'channel' for channels

mention_users.description: List of user IDs to mention in message (channel only)

limit.description: Number of messages to fetch (default: 50). Smart pagination fetches more when needed for time filters.

time_filter.description: Predefined time filter for reading messages

start_time.description: Start time for custom time range. Formats: 'HH:MM' (today), 'yesterday HH:MM', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'. Can combine with time_filter for weekday + time range.

end_time.description: End time for custom time range. Same formats as start_time.

show_both.description: Show both UTC and local time in results (default: true)

search_keywords.description: Keywords to search for in messages (space-separated). Max 10 results. BEST PRACTICE: Always combine with time_filter!

include_channels.description: Include channels in guild list (for list_guilds action)

task_name.description: Name for scheduled task (for create_task action)

day_of_week.description: Day of week for weekly tasks

action_type.description: Type of action for scheduled task

action_target.description: Target channel ID for task action (for channel_post)

message_id.description: Message ID of task to delete (for delete_task action)

channel_id.description: Channel ID where task message is located (for delete_task)

list_tasks.description: List all tasks (for manage_tasks batch action)

delete_task_ids.description: List of message IDs to delete (for manage_tasks batch action)

create_tasks.description: List of task objects to create (for manage_tasks batch action)

operations.description: List of operations to execute in batch (for execute_batch action). Each operation is an object with 'action' and its parameters. Saves API credits by combining multiple calls!
